name: Longshot (idbrii)
description:
Web build doesn't have audio, requires a page refresh to restart after victory, and was not tested as thoroughly as the download version.

A local multiplayer strategy game that's like Worms mixed with Moonbase Commander.

You launch RTS buildings instead of missiles. You start with one launcher building that can fire mineshafts (get resources), barracks (pump out creeps), bombs (terraform/defence), or more launchers. Tech tree lets you make them bouncy, boosty, sticky. Destroy all of your opponent's launchers to win!

Controls Gamepad

Press a button to activate gamepad support. The first two gamepads will be used until restart.

  • Fire: Right Shoulder
  • Aim: Left Stick
  • Cycle Launcher Left: D-pad left
  • Cycle Launcher Right: Left Shoulder
  • Cycle Projectile Next: D-pad down
  • Cycle Projectile Previous: D-pad up
  • Normal Tech: A
  • Sticky Tech: B
  • Bouncy Tech: X
  • Boosty Tech: Y
  • Activate Boosty on current projectile (if Boosty is selected): Right Shoulder

Keyboard - Player 1

  • Fire: space
  • Aim: mouse
  • Aim Left: a
  • Aim Right: d
  • Cycle Launcher Left: q
  • Cycle Launcher Right: e
  • Cycle Projectile Next: s
  • Cycle Projectile Previous: w
  • Normal Tech: 1
  • Bouncy Tech: 2
  • Boosty Tech: 3
  • Sticky Tech: 4
  • Activate Boosty on current projectile (if Boosty is selected): space

Keyboard - Player 2

  • Fire: rctrl
  • Aim Left: left
  • Aim Right: right
  • Cycle Launcher Left: [
  • Cycle Launcher Right: ]
  • Cycle Projectile Next: down
  • Cycle Projectile Previous: up
  • Sticky Tech: 0
  • Normal Tech: 7
  • Bouncy Tech: 8
  • Boosty Tech: 9
  • Activate Boosty on current projectile (if Boosty is selected): rctrl
